QuestData.Title: The Runic Keystone
QuestData.Description: Brann's journal mentions that he used a runic keystone to illuminate the important runes on the plate he discovered. Without the keystone, the plate's contents would be little better than gibberish.$B$BAt the end of Brann's last entry, he describes the iron dwarf defenders seizing the keystone from him, shattering it, and dividing it among themselves. Before we can decipher the runed plate, we must hunt down the fragments. Any of the dwarves within Thor Modan or the buildings around it may carry fragments.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 5 Runic Keystone Fragments to Torthen Deepdig at the Westfall Brigade Encampment.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have enough of the fragments to reconstruct the keystone?
QuestData.RewardText: <Torthen works quickly to assemble the fragments you retrieved.>$B$BThis is incomplete, but it should still allow us to get most of the information from the plate.
